Control Audio Recorder on your brand new Android Wear Watch.Watch Features: - Fully control the phone App, record/stop record/play/stop play/pause.Phone Features:- Unlimited record time and file size (only limited by your SDCard size), recorded file are saved at folder: sdcard/AudioRecorder.- Simple and easy to use user interface, start fast- Play the audio when you select it.- Output format support 3gp/amr/mp4- Long press the file will open option menu for other actions:-- Play in another player-- Rename file-- Delete file-- Send file via email/bluetooth/dropbox/other - Status bar icon- Support XOOM/Android 3.0/Android 3.1- Option to use handset control start/stop recorderOriginal Android Phone and Tablet only version (AD support) is here:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.xuecs.AudioRecorder
descriptionHTML:
This is our popular Audio Recorder (over 1 million downloads) for Android Wear version. Control Audio Recorder on your brand new Android Wear Watch.

Watch Features:
- Fully control the phone App, record/stop record/play/stop play/pause.

Phone Features:
- Unlimited record time and file size (only limited by your SDCard size), recorded file are saved at folder: sdcard/AudioRecorder.
- Simple and easy to use user interface, start fast
- Play the audio when you select it.
- Output format support 3gp/amr/mp4
- Long press the file will open option menu for other actions:
-- Play in another player
-- Rename file
-- Delete file
-- Send file via email/bluetooth/dropbox/other
- Status bar icon
- Support XOOM/Android 3.0/Android 3.1
- Option to use handset control start/stop recorder

Original Android Phone and Tablet only version (AD support) is here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.xuecs.AudioRecorder
comments: Great program but an issue The graphic on the moto 360 is way off center please fix
